title: Sketchbook Folio, "Madonna and Child, Study after Lodovico Carracci", 1815
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower margin: 9 Lodovico Caracci Bologna. On verso at lower margin: Rimini
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Seated Madonna with Child on her lap; suggestion of column and base and draperies in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Madonna and Child, Study after Lodovico Carracci", 1815.
1815. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3489-b.
